DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To investigate effect one-year worksite individual exercise intervention lifestyle-related modifiable health risk , physical capacity work performance . Methods : Two hundred ninety-five employee volunteer participate ( n=191 woman , n=104 men ) , age 38 ± 8 year body mass index ( BMI ) , 24.71 ± 3.79 . Measures physical activity level assess long self-administrated version International Physical Activity Questionnaire-Long Form ( IPAQ-L ) , subject perform maximal cardiopulmonary treadmill grade exercise test . Blood sample anthropometry measure collect participant baseline survey , 6 month 1-year . Components program include supervised moderate high intensity cardiorespiratory exercise , resistance training , flexibility .
DOC.brief_title: Worksite Exercise Intervention Effects Cardiovascular Disease Risk Factors Physical Activity Levels Among Healthy Employees
DOC.criteria: Working ASISA company , middleage ( 2060 ) No medical condition contraindicate exercise participation
